newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian Inco says Q1 net at $7.1 mln.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian Inco says Q1 net at $7.1 mln.

text.p: PT International Nickel Indonesia (PT Inco) said on Thursday it posted an unaudited net profit of $7.1 million for the first quarter of 1997 compared with $7.2 million for the fourth quarter of 1996 and $21.4 million for the first quarter of 1996.
It said in a statement earnings per share for the first quarter of 1997 was three cents compared with three cents for the fourth quarter of 1996 and nine cents for the first quarter of 1996.
The statement said the decrease in 1997 first quarter net earnings, relative to the corresponding 1996 period, reflected lower deliveries and lower nickel price realizations.
(in million dollars except earnings per share)
Earnings per share three cents vs nine cents
NOTE: PT Inco is 58.7 percent owned by Inco Ltd of Canada. -- Jakarta newsroom +6221 384-6364
